pages.text: When the cumulative sponsorship reaches 288.88 yuan, the sponsor becomes the top sponsor of the modpack. $(br2)Top sponsors can customize one or more special exclusive items that belong to the sponsor within a reasonable range, and these items can be part of the game's side quests or even main quests. $(br2)When entering the game, a golden welcome message will be displayed, and all current players on the server will receive the message.
When sending messages in the chat, the brackets next to the name will have a special color, just like this: $(br2)$(6)<$()Name$(6)>$() Message
